title: Leaver Buster
body: Was in a game and team remade, but then I got leaver buster even though it wasn't me that disconnected.

replies.body: we should get a petition going for riot to fix leaver buster because the punishment system all together needs to be more fair

If anyone in a match is marked "inactive" prior to the remake, they'll receive a penalty for the match. The /Remake system marks anyone as "inactive" if they don't take action for 90 seconds within the first 3 minutes of the match. It's a good idea to continue playing normally even if someone has yet to connect since they could come back before the match is eligible for a Remake. If they come back and all their teammates were AFK waiting for a remake, now their whole team is behind rather than just them. 

For complete details, check out our [/Remake FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208754686--Remake-FAQ). Let me know if you have any questions.

The "leaver" penalty for a remade game is given to everyone who is marked as AFK at the time the remake occurs, and there are certain behaviors that will mark you as AFK even if you don't physically disconnect from the game, such as standing/running around in base doing nothing.

Looking at your match history, I see that in the most recent remade game you were level 1 with no items bought, no CS, and no damage dealt or taken, which is a pretty strong indicator that you were AFK, likely standing around in your base if you didn't disconnect.
